1996-12-14.extra_info: w/ exhaust. benefit for the santropol roulant

1997-08-14.extra_info: w/ jordi, grayson + bruce, the throw ups

1997-09-12.extra_info: opening for jim o'rourke, william hooker, dj olive

1997-09-16.extra_info: opening for harriet the spy and thumbnail

1997-10-31.extra_info: part of the libraire alternative bookshop benefit

1998-05-02.extra_info: w/ shalabi effect, fly pan am, david kristian

setlist: do you know how to waltz

1998-11-22.note: note : the whole performance isalso known as "hung over as the queen in maida vale"

1999-09-03.note: note : the band was opening for mogwai. the show was delayed for several hours as mogwai were late. some members of godspeed joined mogwai for their last song 'like herod'. here's the band setlist :NEW THING (PART III)GORECKITHIERRY'S + GATHERINGJOHN HUGHESBLAIZE BAILEY

1999-09-04.note: note : last ever version of the full 'world police'. only the opening section of 'gathering storm' is played on a few shows of this tour.

1999-09-20.note: note : five minutes intro with drones and some drums and glockenspiel. they close the show with the 'chart #3' tape for a few minutes after 'the sad mafioso'. collaboration with labradford for 'peasy', as for most of the end of the tour.

1999-09-21.note: note : 'nothing's alright in our life' tape from the first album opening the show, segueing into a five minutes drone improvisation similar to the seattle show.

1999-09-22.note: note : short, and noisy improvisation with drums to start the show.

1999-09-23.note: note : longest show, and second largest show of the tour after montreal.

1999-09-25.note: note : 'moya/the sad mafioso' was on the setlist but not played.

2000-03-27.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-03-28.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-03-30.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-04-02.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-04-03.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-04-04.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-04-05.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-04-06.extra_info: w/ sigur ros, fly pan am

2000-08-10.note: note : benefit for the 'anthology film archive'. the band played after a couple of movies. there is a break after 'gathering storm' due to a problem with the fire department. first version of 'tazer floyd', a bit faster and  without the outro.

2000-08-11.note: note : benefit for the 'anthology film archive'. the band played after a four movies from the canadian film board.

2000-09-02.note: note : the band played in a barn.

2000-10-05.note: note : the encore starts with noise which could be the intro to 'the sad mafioso but they choose to play the second part of 'gathering storm'. there was no opener, the band played after four movies from the canada film board.

2000-10-28.note: note : the band tried to re-create the second part of 'world police' but it's far from that. the improvisation is a ten minutes minimal jam which starts with drones and sloppy drum beats.

2000-10-30.note: note : the band joined mecca normal for the last song of their set. back

2000-10-31.note: note : the band joined mecca normal for the last song of their set. for halloween, someone touring with the band starts screaming like a monkey and running in the room creating some confusion in the 'john hughes' intro.

2000-11-01.note: note : the set begins with a ten minutes improvisation with loud drones, drums and some riffs at the end.

2000-11-05.note: note : first show in japan. setlist was apparently the same as the second night without the '12-28-99' outro.

2000-11-06.note: note : unusual version of '12-28-99 outro' on this tour.

2000-11-19.note: note : intro of '12-28-99' is aborted for a ten minutes improvisation.

2000-11-20.note: note : rare version of '3rd part' on this tour.

2000-11-22.note: note : good show. extended intro to '3rd part' and first version of 'sad mafioso' since october 99.

2001-09-27.note: note : '12-28-99' has been re-worked. this is the first performance of 'mfr' and the version is similar to the album recording with a faster middle section. the band is well prepared for this tour!

2001-09-28.note: note :  the 1,2,3,4 before 'john hughes' is replaced by 'shopping is patriotic, world leader's say, 1,2,3,4'.back

2001-09-30.note: note : versions of 'dead flag blues (outro)' are fast this tour.

2001-10-01.note: note : the first known and confirmed performance of 'the dead flag blues' after 1999. the song is similar to earlier live version but a bit noisier and louder like most of the other stuff from 2000 and onward. thisis the last performance of it until 2010.

2001-10-02.note: note : out of order. not confirmed

2001-10-30.note: note : they skip the '12-28-99' outro on this one.

2001-11-01.note: note : last known performance of the '12-28-99' outro until 2010.

2001-11-02.note: note : their longest performance until 2002. 'gathering storm' is extended  with some noise.

2002-01-13.note: note : aidan starts each of the four shows with a speech in french. this first night is dedicated against 'police brutality'. the set starts violently with people screaming 'stand up', 'sit down'. most of the songs are re-worked for this tour. each performance of 'dead metheny' from now on contains a new five minutes outro. 'world police' is extented with a new crescendo. the middle part of 'motherfucker=redeemer' is slowed down. this is the first performance of 'the cowboy' since 1998.

2002-04-09.note: note : the five minutes improvisation is played as an intro of 'mfr' instead of the music box sample. some riffs are similar to the montreal impro.

2003-03-05.note: tazer floyd, the encore, was not played.

2003-03-06.note: speech by aidan before the encore.

2003-03-17.note: note : there was a speech before the encore.

2003-03-29.note: no encore, maybe due to some confusion between the band and the venue.

2003-03-31.note: note : efrim did a speech before the encore. he talked about how cmu has a military contract and how the help develop bombs.

2003-04-01.note: may be out of order, aidan did a speech before the encore.

2003-04-03.note: there was a speech by efrim before 'moya'.

2003-04-04.note: the setlist said the encore was to be 'The Sad Mafioso' but it was aborted.

2003-04-05.note: note : the improvisation is a five minute drone intro for 'monheim'.

2003-04-09.note: there was a speech before the encore.

2003-04-11.note: the encore (tazer floyd) was aborted, perhaps because the show started late.

2003-04-12.note: note : the show was in a large cathedral-type church. the improvisations are five minute intros to the first two songs. jackie-o-motherfucker joined the band for 'the dead flag blues'.

2003-04-13.note: note : the original setlist with 'mfr' was changed due to time constraint.

2003-04-14.note: note : about five minutes of noise after 'sad mafioso'.

2003-04-15.note: note : the first encore on the setlist 'bbf3' was aborted.

2003-05-29.note: first version of 'john hughes' of the year.

2010-12-03.note: note : this is the bands first performance since june 2003.     for this era of godspeed each show begins with a 20 minutes improvisation known as 'hope drone',     and ends with a noisy outro which segues from the endings of the final song, ending     with the 'string loops' sample to close the show. moya     has rejoined the band, and norsola departed, so most of     the songs have been reworked. 'albanian' now sounds much closer to the album version. this     is the first performance of 'chart #3' since 2000. it will be played as the intro to 'world police' for most shows on this tour.

2010-12-04.note: note : first performance of 'the cowboy' since april 2002.

2010-12-05.note: note : this is the first performance of 'the dead flag blues' since2001. it is similar to the earlier live versions.

2010-12-15.note: note : this is the last performance ever of 'the dead flag blues'. first performanceof the '12-28-99' outro since 2001.

2010-12-18.note: note : aidan did a speech before the encore.

2011-02-20.note: note : first performance of j.l.h. outro since 2002.

2011-02-21.note: note : last ever performance of 'gamelan', a bit more similar to the album version.

2011-02-27.note: note : the first performance in japan since november 2001.

2011-03-17.venue: the church of st-paul the apostle

2011-03-18.venue: the church of st-paul the apostle

2011-03-26.note: there is a short break after 'albanian' because dave was sick.

2011-04-26.note: ones of the smalles room the band ever played in, 250 capacity.

2011-07-24.venue: atp i'll be your mirror festival

2012-04-19.note: note : part of new song 'behemoth' is teased during the opening drone.

2012-04-20.note: note : part of new song 'behemoth' is teased during the opening drone.

2012-04-21.note: note : last show with bruce on drums.

2012-07-14.note: note : first ever show with tim on drums and the first performance of 'behemoth'. this song will be played at almost every performance from 2012-2016.this version is still very unfinished. 'albanian' has been re-worked. 'chart #3' was skipped thisnight.

2012-09-20.note: note : 'behemoth' has been reworked and now sounds a lot closer to the album version.

2012-10-07.note: note : unconfirmed. first unknown song is either 'gathering storm'or 'monheim', second unknown song is either 'sad mafioso' or 'world police'.

2012-10-12.note: note : last song is not confirmed.

2012-10-15.note: note : the band played without sophie due to a family emergency.

2012-10-28.note: note : the last song was supposed to be 'sad mafioso' but dave's guitarwas broke. the show ends with a few minute's improvisation from sophie.

2012-11-15.note: note : last confirmed performance of the '12-28-99' outro.

2013-02-08.note: note : first oceania tour. 'behemoth' has been reworked.

2013-02-16.venue: atp i'll be your mirror festival

2013-04-12.note: note : their first performance in china.

2013-04-20.note: note : chart #3 was played as an intro to 'sad mafioso', perhaps because the original planned song was 'world police'.

2013-08-05.note: note : this is the first performance of 'the cowboy'since 2011, a reworked version with tim on drums.

2013-08-14.note: note : there is a short improvisation before 'dead metheny'.

2013-10-11.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-12.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-14.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-15.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-18.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-19.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-21.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-22.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-10-24.note: note : opening for Nine Inch Nails.

2013-11-23.venue: atp the end of an era festival

2015-04-07.note: note : this is the first performance of 'anthem for no state'. it is a bit different from the album version, with some additional unreleased sections.

2015-04-09.note: note : first version of 'tazer floyd' since 2012, with tim on drums.

2015-06-26.note: note : not confirmed, may be out of order.

2015-10-24.note: note : the venue's fire alarm is activated during "moya".

2015-11-17.note: note : their first performance in turkey.

2016-03-11.note: note : first performance of 'kincking horse on broken hill' since 1997.

2017-06-10.note: note : this is the first performance of '2 nouveau tower', a completely different arrangementthan the album version with some additional sections. 'anthem for no state' is re-worked and now sounds more or lessidentical to the album version. this setlist will be played for much of 2017 and 2018.

2018-03-24.note: note : sophie did a speech before the show.

2019-08-08.note: note : first performance of the new songs 'glacier' and 'cliff'.

2019-08-11.note: note : good show, although there were some equipment problems during '2 nouveau tower'.

2019-08-17.note: note : they opened with a 12 minutes drone piece with carla bozulich on vocals.

2022-02-25.note: first confirmed performance of 'gathering storm' since september 2016. 'cliff' was extended for a few minutes. it ends with the bells sample from the new album.

2022-02-26.note: short break in the set during 'bosses hang' due to equipment catching fire.

2022-02-27.note: aidan gave a speech before 'gathering storm'.

2022-03-04.thanks: sumerian, lucas, tankhaus, bowen, and jimmy

2022-03-05.thanks: sumerian, lucas, bowen, tankhaus, michael, loughney, and jimmy

2022-03-10.note: they played without mauro and moya.

2022-05-07.note: note : first performance in ottawa since 1999.

2022-07-13.note: second time that the band played in turkey.

2022-08-28.note: note : the show starts with a tape from the new album.

2022-09-17.note: first performance of 'world police' since 2016. 'chart #3' is not played.

2022-09-18.note: There is a pause during the show because of problems with two amp on the stage.

2022-09-19.note: The first performance of Tazer Floyd since April 2015.

2022-09-30.note: the first time that Fire at Static Valley was played.

2022-10-31.thanks: will akers, tollbooths, eve, and spnii

2023-03-14.note: note : some equipment failure during the show.

2023-03-19.note: note : the setlist originally had "dead metheny", "static valley", and "world police" but this was changed.
